title: COVID-19 Vaccine
author: Drinkcaffeine Com
description: Community Health Center Inc. in Connecticut is now providing COVID-19 vaccines to CHC patients aged 12 and up.
cleaned_text: appointment](https://chc1.co/cv19sched) at one of our health center locations. Per the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's (CDC's) recommendation, CHC is administering the Pfizer and Moderna COVID-19 vaccines. CHC is currently administering the COVID vaccine primary series to individuals 6 months and older. Individuals 6 months-5 years old who received a Moderna vaccine are eligible for a bivalent Moderna booster 2 months after the primary series. Individuals 6 months-4 years old who received a Pfizer vaccine are eligible for a bivalent booster as the third dose in the series. [Click here to self-schedule your appointment](https://chc1.co/cv19sched) CHC patients may walk in for vaccines (capacity permitting) Monday-Friday 9AM-12PM and 1PM-4PM - no appointment needed. Non-patients are encouraged to call 860-347-6971 to schedule an appointment. If you are not currently established with CHC as a patient and would like to establish care, [click here to learn more about becoming a patient](https://www.chc1.com/for-patients/become-a-patient/). For more information on the COVID vaccine and the booster shot, [click here to visit the CDC website](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/stay-up-to-date.html). Wondering what to expect after you get your vaccine? [Click here](https://publichealthcollaborative.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Now-What_Vertical_ENG_2.jpg) for information from the Public Health Collaborative. [Also available in Spanish.](https://publichealthcollaborative.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/Making-the-Decision_Vertical_SPN-scaled.jpg) If you need an official record of your COVID-19 vaccination, the [CT WiZ Immunization Public Portal](https://portal.ct.gov/DPH/Immunizations/CT-WiZ-Access-My-Immunization-Record?fbclid=IwAR3MpK4o_roaNQ8jup3Xnz3L_Fd0tuPYgLG3VY-yoE54C9V3QEpzHwMC3Hk) is the fastest way to get documentation of your COVID vaccines. If you are unable to locate your record in CT WiZ, please call us
